name: Taiga
description:
A team of prospector scientists are exploring far reaches of Russian taiga in search of mineral deposits.
But you don't get to decide the fate of these lands.

You play as Sergey, you have just joined the team, and they are already carrying out local geology inspection.
Next morning you were supposed to join in on the action, but..
The taiga has other plans for you and your colleagues.
Will you live through the ordeal?

Don't stay in the dark for too long.


Stay close to sources of light, and avoid staying the dark for too long.
In this wilderness even the hardest people start to give away.
And that is when the taiga takes you.

The GPS is your way out.


Consult your GPS navigator often, it would be foolish to think that you can make it out of this green maze by memory or instinct.

Features:

  • Switch input to controller in-game and set up your own control scheme.
  • VR. Play with maximum immersion.
